src_original: the hare,  the monkey and the elephant  bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśīṣu janapade anyatamasmin vanagahane catvāraḥ prāṇinaḥ prativasanti kapiñjalaḥ śaśo markaṭo gajaś (Śay-v 6)  ca; te ca parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānā aśaṃkino yatheṣṭavihāratayā kālam atināmayanti;
tgt_original: 象、獼猴、鵽鳥，依一尼拘律樹住。

src_original: yāvad apareṇa samayena teṣāṃ buddhir utpannā; (MSV III 126)

asti vayaṃ bhavantaḥ parasparaṃ sakhyenāvasthitāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā avivadamānāḥ;  kin tu na jānīmaḥ ko 'smābhiḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ iti;  yan nu vayaṃ yathāvṛddhikāṃ prajñapayema iti;
tgt_original: 『我等共住，不應不興恭敬更相輕慢，寧可推年大小次第尊卑更相恭敬。 若年長者，當尊重恭敬供養。

src_original: te parasparaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhā iti;  ko 'smākaṃ vṛddha iti;  tataḥ kapiṃjalena vaṭavṛkṣo darśitaḥ;
tgt_original: 作如是法已，依林間共住。 』獼猴、鵽鳥共問象言：

src_original: mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo matpramāṇa eva uccatveneti;
tgt_original: 『我憶小時此尼拘律樹，我行時觸我臍。

src_original: markaṭaḥ kathayati;  mayā yūthena sahānena pathā gacchatā ayaṃ dṛṣṭo mama tulya evoccatveneti;  te kathayanti;  tvam asya vṛddha iti;  śaśaḥ kathayati;

paśyata yūyam enaṃ vaṭavṛkṣaṃ mahatpramāṇākāram;  te kathayanti:  paśyāmaḥ; etasmān mayā phalāni bhakṣayitvāsmin pradeśe uccāraḥ kṛtas tasmād ayaṃ jāta iti; (A 315b)  te kathayanti:  yady evaṃ tvam asmākaṃ sarveṣāṃ vṛddha iti;
tgt_original: 『我憶小時此尼拘律樹舉手及頭。
